EmailTemplate.description: Response for February 2012 webinar featuring ALAS WB clients
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Feb12 ALAS WB Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp Wall Builder Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Making the Business Case for Confidentiality and IntApp Wall Builder: Advice from Peer Firms Date: Thursday, February 23 Time: 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern / 5pm GMT
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/Events/intapp/ Participant Code: 97447854
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: US/Canada: (888) 567-1603 UK: 00 800 4747 4646 (You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar)
